(a)(t)cristina

Cristina is an art consultant uniquely poised to address the distinct needs of collectors, artists, museums, and philanthropists. Combining visionary planning, tailored advice, and expert legal counsel, she offers seamless implementation and unparalleled access through an extensive network of relationships.

Confidence, like art, never comes from having all the answers; it comes from being open to all the questions.
      - Earl Gray Stevens
